review: Kind of fun, easy to set up. And plays off of all our devices. I also have google play so it's makes things easy.
author: Michael Anderson

review: I've been using this for about three months now and I would return it if could, but the return window has expired.  When it works, I think it does a decent job, but 9 times out of 10 when I try to connect to it "the device can't be found" and I have to reboot my computer or change my network settings.  Today I got the usual device can't be found message and have tried all the recommended solutions and I haven't been able to get it to work at all, so I think I'm done with.  It's not worth the frustration.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's very easy to set up and works well with applications designed to take advantage of it, like YouTube. However, I am disappointed because the key applications that I want to cast aren't set up for it and my tablet's android system version is not suitable for letting me add the Chrome extension needed to cast my tablet screen through Chrome. So, in the end, it doesn't give me the options that I wanted.
author: Paul M. Gunter

review: What an incredible device! I am able to stream any movies I have on my PC or external HDD to the Chromecast attached to my tv across the house! exactly what I was looking for! Movies and Sound come in clear as day! LOVE THIS.
author: Keith Newman

review: Was a gift, they were very happy
author: lcuculich
